metadata.title: Find Suppliers
metadata.description: Quickly and easily find the perfect suppliers for your next event.

title: Find Suppliers
subtitle: Quickly and easily find the perfect suppliers for your next event.

defineNeeds.title: Define Your Needs
defineNeeds.description: Specify your event details, including location, date, number of participants, and the type of suppliers you need.

browseSuppliers.title: Browse Suppliers
browseSuppliers.description: Browse through our database of thousands of suppliers, filtering by location, capacity, services, and more.

requestQuotes.title: Request Quotes
requestQuotes.description: Select the suppliers you're interested in and request quotes with just a click. No need to call or email each one individually.

verifiedSuppliers.title: Thousands of Verified Suppliers
verifiedSuppliers.description: Our database includes over 3,500 suppliers across various categories:
verifiedSuppliers.verification: All suppliers in our database are verified to ensure quality and reliability.

filterCriteria.title: Filter by Multiple Criteria
filterCriteria.description: Narrow down your search by location, capacity, price range, services offered, and more to find the perfect match for your event.

compareSuppliers.title: Compare Suppliers Side by Side
compareSuppliers.description: Select multiple suppliers and compare their offerings, prices, and reviews side by side to make an informed decision.

saveFavorites.title: Save Favorites
saveFavorites.description: Save your favorite suppliers to revisit later or share with colleagues when making decisions.

readReviews.title: Read Reviews
readReviews.description: See ratings and reviews from other event planners who have worked with the suppliers you're considering.

cta.title: Ready to find the perfect suppliers for your event?
cta.description: Join thousands of event planners who use Event Logic to find and book suppliers.
